channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parked illegally, 12th February
item.description:
Same problem as always. As always nothing done by the council.

item.title: Blocking entire footway almost every night, 11th February
item.description:
DKT-WUF. This footway has being entirely blocked by Lime bikes almost every single night for over one year. This causes great concern for the blind and visually impaired pedestrians who use this footway regularly. Please sanction your riders for these obstructions. Thank you for your attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Road, Shacklewell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes all over this section of road, 11th February
item.description:
Large potholes appearing around this section of road. Causes vehicles to swerve around them to avoid a blown tyre.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crabtree Manorway North, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole on slip road to A13, 11th February
item.description:
There is a pot hole at the start of the Wennington slip road that joins the a13 towards lakeside. I cannot attach a photo as it’s not safe to get out in the car here or use my phone while driving, I have attached a screenshot of the location from Apple map and the pothole can be seen however it’s a lot worse now. This is going to cause a lot off issues because people are swerving it now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of furniture thrown over their balcony onto the pavement below., 11th February
item.description:
A male on the roof/ balcony throwing furniture (mattresses, bed base, rugs etc)

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plumstead High Street, Plumstead

item.title: 3x new potholes, 11th February
item.description:
3 new potholes have opened up around existing previous repairs. Very deep already and spraying hard-core when driven over
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenure Road, Eltham

item.title: Car has been parked in electric charger bay for a few days now., 11th February

item.title: Graffiti / sticker on road sign, 11th February
item.description:
There is a sticker/ graffiti over the road sign on the slip road off at falconwood. It has been there for over 6 months. Is of a brain which looks like it is taking drugs. This is not good for young children to see.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crown Woods Way, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping blue sofa mattress, 11th February
item.description:
Please collect the blue sofa/futon mattress outside 2 Lawrence Buildings at junction with Garnham Street.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Garnham Street, Hackney, London

item.title: North bound carriageway haunches poor condition, 11th February
item.description:
Road broken in multiple segments between the railway bridge and the junction for west horndon. Cycling this road has become an obstacle course - the worst part of the road is where cyclists will most likely be. I’ll use my MTB next time so I don’t destroy my road bike wheels.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street, 11th February
item.description:
A bin has been left in the street. Pointing out as this will inevitably get filled with rubbish and become a problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sheldon Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Pothole, 11th February
item.description:
Deep wide pothole on A13 London Bound as you approach Wennington junction from Lakeside. It is in Lane 1 and is close to the white line adjoining lane 2. It is deep and wide probably about as wide as half a dustbin lid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A13
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Majority of the north bound carriageway has a range of pot holes ranging over 400m from the mini roundabout, 11th February
item.description:
This array of pot holes has been in this location for over a month. Due to the inclement weather the holes are growing at a rate of knots.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed frame and mattress dumped, 11th February
item.description:
Bed frame and mattress dumped on the pavement junction of Purfleet Road and Grange Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging tree branch, unable to get into my car., 11th February
item.description:
Can the tree be cut by a tree surgeon. It’s over hanging for some time, it hasn’t got many leaves on it now so it will be easy to cut at this time. One branch hits my passengers car window so they cannot exit the car when parked in my private car space. So they get out before I park it. Please can you assess all the trees over hanging on other cars to the left. I could cut it myself but may get into trouble, I’d also need a long extension lead . :) thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chaucer Drive, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole roundabout is damaged with potholes, 11th February
item.description:
This damage has been there for at least 2 weeks and getting worse. Vehicles having to cut across and not go round to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Homewood Crescent, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
